thread.title: Arsenal FC transfer news: Paris Saint-Germain hopeful of beating Juventus to Alexis Sanchez | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal FC transfer news: Paris Saint-Germain hopeful of beating Juventus to Alexis Sanchez | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal FC transfer news: Paris Saint-Germain hopeful of beating Juventus to Alexis Sanchez | Metro News
text:
Paris Saint-Germain hopeful of beating Juventus to signing of Arsenal superstar Alexis Sanchez gossip Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Sunday 12 Feb 2017 7:37 pm Alexis Sanchez is locked in a contract stand-off with Arsenal (Picture: Getty) 
Paris Saint-Germain are hopeful of beating Juventus to the signing of Arsenal superstar Alexis Sanchez , reports say. 
Sanchez only has 18 months remaining on his current contract at the Emirates and appears to be no nearer to agreeing a new deal. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
The Chilean’s situation in north London has alerted the attention of several European clubs, with Juventus believed to be preparing a huge summer move. 
But the Daily Mirror say the Serie A giants face fierce competition from PSG, who have made enquiries with the forward’s representatives about a possible switch to France. 
It is claimed the Gunners are becoming increasingly fearful that Sanchez, one of the Premier League’s stand-out players, will decide to leave the club. Arsenal fixtures 
Bayern Munich – Champions League (A) – Wed 15 Feb Sutton – FA Cup (A) – weekend of 17/18 Feb Liverpool (A) – Sat 4 Mar Bayern Munich – Champions League (H) – Tue 7 Mar Leicester (H) – Sat 11 Mar West Brom (A) – Sat 18 Mar Manchester City (H) – Sat 1 Apr West Ham (H) – Tue 4 Apr Sanchez has been a key player for Gunners boss Arsene Wenger (Picture: Getty) 
The 28-year-old has scored 46 goals in 90 league games since signing from Barcelona in 2014, and was named Arsenal’s Player of the Season in 2015.
